Name: Ragdoll Knight
About the game: The drunken Knight woke up in an unfamiliar forest and cannot understand how he ended up here, and most importantly where all his clothes went, since his helmet was preserved, which can save him from annoying birds. Try in a drunken stupor to go through simple at first glance levels with non-standard controls. Ragdoll Knight - A platformer game with a physical world, where the player controls a drunken knight who stumbles over something, loses his balance from the blows of arriving birds and is about to break his head on a nearby stone. Features of the game: - Physical World - Complexity - Pixel Art
